values.desc: Sets the default assertion status for this class loader to false and discards any package defaults or class assertion status settings associated with the class loader.
Returns the parent class loader for delegation.
Finds the resource with the given name.
Returns an input stream for reading the specified resource.
Finds all the resources with the given name.
Returns the system class loader for delegation.
Find a resource of the specified name from the search path used to load classes.
Open for reading, a resource of the specified name from the search path used to load classes.
Finds all resources of the specified name from the search path used to load classes.
Loads the class with the specified binary name.
Sets the desired assertion status for the named top-level class in this class loader and any nested classes contained therein.
Sets the default assertion status for this class loader.
Sets the package default assertion status for the named package.

values.code: defineClass(b: ByteArray!, off: Int, len: Int)
values.desc: Converts an array of bytes into an instance of class Class.

values.code: defineClass(name: String!, b: ByteArray!, off: Int, len: Int)
values.desc: Converts an array of bytes into an instance of class Class.

values.code: defineClass(name: String!, b: ByteArray!, off: Int, len: Int, protectionDomain: ProtectionDomain!)
values.desc: Converts an array of bytes into an instance of class Class, with an optional ProtectionDomain.

values.code: defineClass(name: String!, b: ByteBuffer!, protectionDomain: ProtectionDomain!)
values.desc: Converts a ByteBuffer into an instance of class Class, with an optional ProtectionDomain.

values.code: definePackage(name: String!, specTitle: String!, specVersion: String!, specVendor: String!, implTitle: String!, implVersion: String!, implVendor: String!, sealBase: URL!)
values.desc: Defines a package by name in this ClassLoader.
Finds the class with the specified binary name.
Returns the absolute path name of a native library.
Returns the class with the given binary name if this loader has been recorded by the Java virtual machine as an initiating loader of a class with that binary name.
Finds the resource with the given name.
Returns an enumeration of URL objects representing all the resources with the given name.
Finds a class with the specified binary name, loading it if necessary.
Returns a Package that has been defined by this class loader or any of its ancestors.
Returns all of the Packages defined by this class loader and its ancestors.
Loads the class with the specified binary name.
Registers the caller as parallel capable.
Links the specified class.
Sets the signers of a class.
